title: Corduroy and 4 other bear stories
brief_description: Five children’s stories including the lovable “Corduroy” by Don Freeman, a bear with no owner; “The Bear and the fly” by Paula Winter which tells about a hilarious disaster at dinner time; “Blueberries for Sal” by Robert McCloskey has Sal and her bear ending up with the wrong mother; “Panama” tells of a bear and a tiger who search for Panama, the land of their dreams in this story by Janosch; Frank Asch’s story “Happy Birthday Moon” is a story about love and friendship.
